multiplechoiceresponse.label: According to the reference text, what is a key benefit of using generative models in the context of facial detection?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Automatic identification of feature distributions without labeling
Improved accuracy in identifying common facial features
Reduced computational cost of training facial detection models
Enhanced ability to detect facial expressions
